amendment.description: Amendment consisted of the following amendments printed in House Report 112-267 and offered en bloc: Nos. 1, 2, 11, 12, 14, 16, 17 and 18.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: Amendments Nos. 1,2,11,12,14,16,17, and 18 printed in House Report 112-267.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. LoBiondo.
On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
